title: S16 Ep93: TCT: 16 Minutes: The Murder of Matthew w/Diane Moore
itunes:title: TCT: 16 Minutes: The Murder of Matthew w/Diane Moore
description:
True Crime Tuesday investigates 16 Minutes: The Murder of Matthew with guest Diane Moore

Dave & Tim discover a tale of terror. On the early morning of March 6, 1993, an intense fire broke out in a tiny nursery. Sixteen minutes later, firefighters had extinguished the blaze, only to reveal a room burned so severely, everything was virtually unrecognizable. What they discovered looked like a monster from a horror film.

Was it arson? What was the motive? Along with the tenacious and determined Detective Leslie Van Buskirk, Diane Marger Moore persisted for more than two years to find the truth and get justice for young Matthew Wise.

Subscribe to True Crime Tuesday here:  stitcherpremium.com/darkness

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3s2kg6A
